Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 61st overall pick, by West Texas in 1968...
Injured on 5/3/1968 with a Broken Hand, out for 5 weeks...
Injured on 7/27/1968 with a Sore Shoulder, out for 4 days...
Injured on 6/10/1969 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for 3 days...
Injured on 8/26/1970 with a Pulled Groin Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had first career hit on 6/13/1973, off David Hans (Ash)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/18/1974, off Fred Myers (SYR)...
Injured on 6/26/1974 with a Hyper Extended Knee, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Shortstop in 1977...
Signed as a free agent by Halifax on 2/1/1979 to a 4-year deal worth $5,250,000 per year...
Injured on 6/28/1980 with a Pulled Hip Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 5/30/1983 with a Inflamed Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/28/1983, hitting .500 with 6 HR, 12 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Lynchburg on 4/29/1984...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/5/1984, hitting .577 with 2 HR, 6 RBI...
